title: 后台报错，哪位大大帮忙看一下
author: GodLion
txt_content: 06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO # /tmp/jvm-43065/hs_error.log06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 5592580096 bytes for committing reserved memory.06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO #06.01 12:48:56 [Server] INFO OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000060bf80000, 5592580096, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12）今天服务器重启了一下，然后就起不来了。。。。。哪位大大看一下怎么解决这个问题
